import { useState } from "react" import { Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import authService from './../../services/auth.services' import FormError from "../FormError/FormError" const SignupForm = () => { const [signupData, setSignupData] = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '' }) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleInputChange = e => { const { value, name } = e.target setSignupData({ ...signupData, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() authService .signup(signupData) .then(({ data }) => navigate('/profile')) .catch(err => { (console.log(err)) }) } const { username, password, email } = signupData return (
Nombre de usuario Contrase√±a Email
) } export default SignupForm
